articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode impresses testers with sound effects, catching its breath - Ars Technica
articles.description: AVM allows uncanny real-time voice conversations with ChatGPT that you can interrupt.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ A stock photo of a robot whispering to a man.

On Tuesday, OpenAI began rolling out an alpha version of its new Advanced Voice Mode to a small group of ChatGPT Plus subscribers. This fea… [+4817 chars]
